name: Car Parking Real, Multi Levels and Maps Car Park Game In Street, Traffic and Parking Areas
name_original: Car Parking Real, Multi Levels and Maps Car Park Game In Street, Traffic and Parking Areas
description:
It is time to park that car!

Bored of other car parking games ? Would like to give try our free park game ? We developed a super car parking game with one of the most realistic cars in it. Very accurate physics and parking simulations. precise detector system, many camera angels and so on. City, traffic, and other areas to drive in. Be careful while driving not to crash and be the king of car parkers. But you will need skills for this. You can play the game with your kid ( boy or girl ) and teach him or her

Features
- Stunning realistic graphics quality and hd eye catching visuals
- 6 Maps and 120 multi levels to play
- Each map is unique ( Park area, city and traffic, other places, sky lights, houses, garages, other buildings )
- Challenging multi crazy levels ( obstacles, bumps, cones, etc… )
- Amazing 3D cars and real time shiny reflections
- Real-life like driving experience, extreme precise physics simulator
- Different camera angles ( in car driver camera included )
- Vehicle telemetry ( speed, gas percentage, crash indicator, parking sensors )
- Car parking detectors ( drive aids )
- Steering wheel or arrow options, sliding gas and break simulations
- Rewards, Daily gifts and Store options
- This game is suitable for kids ( boy or girl )

Support
Please email us or use our social media about anything you need to state
We will be delighted if you enlighten us about new features you want in our games.

Thank you
We wish for you the best real game play experience in 2016
